sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0490 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# , #businCd# , #deptCd# , #payrUcstDgmSeilNum# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #payCd# , #payItemCd# , #itemNm# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducFrmCd# , #pymtDducRate# , #pymtDducSum# , #txtnDivCd# , #freeDtyRate# , #freeDtySum# , #jan# , #feb# , #mar# , #apr# , #may# , #jun# , #jul# , #aug# , #sep# , #oct# , #nov# , #dec# , #rngeOrd# , #payItemUseYn# , #itemApptnBgnnDt# , #itemApptnEndDt# , #dayMnthAmntDivCd# , #calcStdDivCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #usalyAmntYn# , #payItemNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #calcStdFunc# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ( SELECT BA0500.BUSIN_STDT FROM BASS0500 BA0500 WHERE BA0500.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND BA0500.BUSIN_CD = #creBusinCd#) AS ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ( SELECT BA0500.BUSIN_EDDT FROM BASS0500 BA0500 WHERE BA0500.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND BA0500.BUSIN_CD = #creBusinCd#) AS ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , KYBDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC FROM PAYR0490 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
BUSIN_CD = #businCd#
ORDER BY PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0490 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# , #businCd# , #deptCd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1 FROM PAYR0490 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd# ) , #payrMangDeptCd# , #payCd# , #payItemCd# , #itemNm# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducFrmCd# , #pymtDducRate# , #pymtDducSum# , #txtnDivCd# , #freeDtyRate# , #freeDtySum# , #jan# , #feb# , #mar# , #apr# , #may# , #jun# , #jul# , #aug# , #sep# , #oct# , #nov# , #dec# , #rngeOrd# , #payItemUseYn# , #itemApptnBgnnDt# , #itemApptnEndDt# , #dayMnthAmntDivCd# , #calcStdDivCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #usalyAmntYn# , #payItemNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #calcStdFunc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0490 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAY_YR=#payYr# , BUSIN_CD=#businCd# , DEPT_CD=#deptCd# , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM=#payrUcstDgmSeilNum# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# , ITEM_NM=#itemNm# , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD=#pymtDducDivCd# , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD=#pymtDducFrmCd# , PYMT_DDUC_RATE=#pymtDducRate# , PYMT_DDUC_SUM=#pymtDducSum# , TXTN_DIV_CD=#txtnDivCd# , FREE_DTY_RATE=#freeDtyRate# , FREE_DTY_SUM=#freeDtySum# , JAN=#jan# , FEB=#feb# , MAR=#mar# , APR=#apr# , MAY=#may# , JUN=#jun# , JUL=#jul# , AUG=#aug# , SEP=#sep# , OCT=#oct# , NOV=#nov# , DEC=#dec# , RNGE_ORD=#rngeOrd# , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN=#payItemUseYn# , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT=#itemApptnBgnnDt# , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT=#itemApptnEndDt# , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD=#dayMnthAmntDivCd# , CALC_STD_DIV_CD=#calcStdDivCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , USALY_AMNT_YN=#usalyAmntYn# , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT=#payItemNoteCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , CALC_STD_FUNC=#calcStdFunc# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd# AND PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM=#payrUcstDgmSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0490 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd# AND PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM=#payrUcstDgmSeilNum#
DELETE FROM PAYR0490 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC FROM PAYR0490 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd# AND PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM=#payrUcstDgmSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , fcBass0500CDNM(DPOB_CD,PAY_YR,DEPT_CD,BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM , DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(DPOB_CD,DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = PAYR0490.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , DPOB_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD) AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD) AS PYMT_DDUC_FRM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,TXTN_DIV_CD) AS TXTN_DIV_NM , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD) AS DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_NM , CALC_STD_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,CALC_STD_DIV_CD) AS CALC_STD_DIV_NM , EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , USALY_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC FROM PAYR0490 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = #payrMangDeptCd#
PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd#
DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
BUSIN_CD = #businCd#
PAY_CD = #payCd#
ORDER BY PAY_ITEM_CD DESC , PAY_YR DESC , BUSIN_CD DESC , DEPT_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD DESC , PAY_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0490 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = #payrMangDeptCd#
PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd#
DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
BUSIN_CD = #businCd#
PAY_CD = #payCd#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO PAYR0490 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , BUSIN_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD
, PAY_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD
, PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM
, JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY
, JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT
, NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT
, ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN
, PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CALC_STD_FUNC ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# , #businCd# , #deptCd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PAYR_UCST_DGM_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1 FROM PAYR0490 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND BUSIN_CD=#businCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd# ) , #payrMangDeptCd# , #payCd# , #payItemCd# , #itemNm# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducFrmCd# , #pymtDducRate# , #pymtDducSum# , #txtnDivCd# , #freeDtyRate# , #freeDtySum# , #jan# , #feb# , #mar# , #apr# , #may# , #jun# , #jul# , #aug# , #sep# , #oct# , #nov# , #dec# , #rngeOrd# , #payItemUseYn# , #itemApptnBgnnDt# , #itemApptnEndDt# , #dayMnthAmntDivCd# , #calcStdDivCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #usalyAmntYn# , #payItemNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #calcStdFunc# )
